attributes.review: I got this app to support our 🧚‍♀️✨🌈amazing racist orange horse looking dementia having president 🧚‍♀️✨🧚‍♀️ but it never opened (definitely not because I didn’t open it 🤭🤭). Very upset and would like to never see this app or Trumps face again 🥰🥰🥰
attributes.title: 😡😡 Very disappointing

attributes.review: Imma just say it. This app is doo doo. Took many days to finish downloading. There are micro transactions that you can unlock if you send a pic of your micro pp. I did it but nothing happened. I just wanted to get more skins in the app. That is all I’ve ever wanted. Also, I came here to protect Tik Tok FOR THE BOYS.
attributes.title: Doo doo

attributes.review: When I open my phone after I downloaded this app James Charles was right there and he said HI SISTERS and I was like AhAhAhAhAhAha then he told me to meet him by the old school by my house for some candy so I said OF Course and now I’m in James Charles car and I still don’t have my free candy
attributes.title: JAMES CHARLES

attributes.review: The app is absolutely horrid! Once I downloaded it, it made my device crash. It was left frozen and could not use it for 2 days. Thus, this app should be immediately removed at once!
attributes.title: No thanks

attributes.review:
do you not get this app I repeat do not get this app this app is stupid. This app takes up all of your storage all of your battery and it crashes my phone

attributes.title: why should anyone get this app

attributes.review: my cell phone keeps crashing because of the app, its like its clearing out my phone of data. other apps deleted by themselves. none of this started happening until i actually downloded the app
attributes.title: V

attributes.review: This app is taking up so much data on my phone not to mention it has problems opening up. I don’t think I’ve seen such an app that is so out of date (just like our president) :).
attributes.title: Terrible app

attributes.review: The setup of this app is completely disorganized I can’t find a single thing I’m looking for. The app has also been making my phone run slow and it crashes like a million times. Dump trump 2020🤢
attributes.title: Worst app

attributes.review: When I opened up the app, I saw an extra large oompa lomos type looking person. I was sitting on the edge of glory and I feel off and almost died! It was the scariest thing EVER. DO NOT GET THIS APP. I for real thought si was going to die 🥺, even though I was on the Edge of Glory 😞
attributes.title: No, just no 😊

attributes.review: this app took a WHOLE YEAR to install but after waiting for so long i was excited to see it! When i first opened it a OOMPA LOMPA was on the screen very unprofessional for a presidents app. This app made my whole phone crash so many times and IT HAD THE BIGGEST LAG
attributes.title: SCARY
